attributes.action: Reduce IHT to 20% and increase the nil rate band to 1 million
attributes.additional_details: The madness of the British IHT system is way over what is morally acceptable. It is also way over many other european democracies - its about time it was brought under control. In communism there is no property ownership. In democracy property ownership is a defining factor. Being punished due to success is not acceptable.
